long_description: Keep your Jetboil Personal Cooking system or Group Cooking system working at peak performance. Maintenance kit includes spare piezo igniter. Compatible with the Jetboil Personal Cooking system and Jetboil Group Cooking system; not compatible with the Jetboil Zip, Flash, Sol, Sol Ti or Helios systems.
short_description: Keep your Jetboil Personal Cooking system or Group Cooking system working at peak performance. Maintenance kit includes spare piezo igniter.
